sentences.en: He stood aghast at the terrible sight.
sentences.cn: 他被眼前的可怕景象吓呆了.

sentences.en: His colleagues were aghast at the sackings.
sentences.cn: 他的同事们对于这些解雇感到很吃惊。

sentences.en: I was aghast at the incomprehension of our leadership.
sentences.cn: 我对于我们领导不理解形势的情况也大感吃惊.

sentences.en: Scarlett was aghast at such words coming from Melly of all people.
sentences.cn: 思嘉想不到媚兰竟说出这样的话来,觉得太可怕了.

sentences.en: She looked almost aghast under the new idea she was receiving.
sentences.cn: 她听到这件从未想到过的事情后,差不多给吓得发呆.

sentences.en: She stood aghast at the black shadow in the drawing room.
sentences.cn: 她被客厅里的黑影吓呆了.

sentences.en: She stood aghast at the snake.
She was aghast at the extent of the damage to her car.
sentences.cn: 她的汽车的损坏程度使她震惊.

sentences.en: She watched aghast as his life flowed away.
sentences.cn: 看着他的生命逐渐消逝，她惊骇万分。

sentences.en: Tania stared at him aghast, unable to speak.
sentences.cn: 塔妮娅吃惊地看着他，说不出话来。

sentences.en: The pillars of the heavens quake, aghast at his rebuke.
sentences.cn: 天的柱子, 因他的斥责,震动惊奇.

sentences.en: They stood aghast at this unforeseen disaster.
sentences.cn: 他们被这意外的灾祸吓呆了.

sentences.en: TYPICAL USE : Many people would aghast at the thought of another war.
sentences.cn: 许多人一想到再打仗就觉得很恐怖.

trans.tran_cn: 惊呆的，吓呆的，被…吓呆，被吓得目瞪口呆
trans.tran_en: feeling or looking shocked by something you have seen or just found out
